    • getUser

    • createUser

      public GameUser createUser(String name, String username, String password)
      Returns a new user, or null if an active user with the passed username already exists.
      Parameters:
      name - New user's screen name
      username - User's username for the purpose of logging-in/authorizing
      password - User's password for the purpose of logging-in/authorizing
      Returns:
      New GameUser object corresponding to the newly created user, or null if already exists. Any database errors result in exceptions.

    • validateLogin

      public GameUser validateLogin(String username, String password)
      Returns the GameUser associated with a given username if the password matches
      Parameters:
      username - Username for the desired user
      password - Password for the desired user
      Returns:
      GameUser corresponding to the username/password, or null if not found or wrong password

    • refresh

      public void refresh(BulletZoneData bzData, GameItemRepository gameItemRepo)
      Reads the database and fills the HashMaps as appropriate. Intended to be called once at time of initialization.
      Parameters:
      bzData - reference to BulletZoneData class to use for SQL queries
      gameItemRepo - reference to already-initialized GameItemRepository
